properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 210200Z TO 280159Z FEB BY
   M/V SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE TOWING
   THREE 200 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-15.10S 040-03.90W, 22-27.17S 039-55.38W,
   22-32.70S 039-58.60W, 22-24.98S 040-10.85W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 425/13.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 280259Z FEB 13.
